definition[0]: if someone languishes somewhere, they are forced to remain in a place where they are unhappy
example[0]: Shaw languished in jail for fifteen years.
definition[1]: if something languishes, it fails to improve and develop or become successful
example[1]: The housing market continues to languish.
example[2]: The shares are languishing at just 46p after yesterdayâ€™s fall.
example[3]: West Ham United are currently languishing at the bottom of the league.
